text:
Hey Sam :wave:
How's it going? How are your studies and projects going? I hope you are enjoying the weather here in London!

Thank you for sending forward your list - I'll have a scout for friends at those companies and see if I can pass their contact details on to you. If you want to run your portfolio and CV by me first please do go ahead! :memo:

Regarding the length of the mentoring programme, we can carry on for as long as you need - I'll be available to contact on here for the foreseeable future.
However, I'm coming up to a very busy time at the end of August, so I feel it would be best for us to come to a close at this time.
You can continue to contact me of course, I just might not be as instantly available after Aug 30th.
I hope this works with you and gives you some time to think of anything else you would like to ask about!
